name: Cheddar
short_description:
Well, fixing up Cheddar's code has been fun, but sadly, I have concluded that it's not worth it to maintain two Web browsers at once. Users of Cheddar should switch to Ryouko, the other browser I've been maintaining. Ryouko is fairly similar to Cheddar in feel, and also offers a .EXE version for Windows. Although I will no longer maintain Cheddar, you can always fork it if you feel up to the task - it's open-source, after all. =)

Ryouko's project page is located at http://sourceforge.net/projects/ryouko/

Cheddar is a tabbed Web browser coded in Python and PyQt4. It was originally started by thebluex, so major thanks goes to him. Since the original project (located at http://code.google.com/p/cheddar-browser/) hasn't been updated for about 2 years now, I decided to fork it for fun. Cheddar is hereby released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.  This means that it comes with NO WARRANTY WHATSOEVER. Cheddar also does not work properly on Windows, and is untested on Mac.
summary: Tabbed Web browser for Linux, coded in Python/PyQt4
